creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: Mary on a throne holding baby Jesus who is standing on her PR leg; angel on either side of throne; Mary's PL hand rests on a book on knee; printed on sheet that is rounded at the top
inscription:
Stamp

in graphite on verso: Pass 538 / A22 with underline across the top / L.2722
markings: blue stamp on verso, UL: Ivan Izaklevitch de Kouriss, Lugt 2722
provenance: Ivan Izaklevitch de Kouriss (died around 1900), Lugt 2722, Odessa (sale Berlin, November 1889). [C.G. Boerner, Düsseldorf, inv. no. A22.] John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Virgin Enthroned
